alert.note: Alert for Yellowstone National Park (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 29 at 1:56PM MST until December 31 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations between midday Wednesday and early Friday of 6 to 10 inches in the southwest mountains. Totals of 3 to 6 inches for much of the rest of the park except only up to 2 inches at Mammoth. * WHERE...Yellowstone National Park. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. The steadiest snow is expected late Wednesday afternoon and evening, and again on Thursday afternoon into the evening. * IMPACTS...Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility over mainly the southern half of the park.
info.instruction: Outdoor enthusiasts should be prepared for cold temperatures and gusty wind, which will make for very cold wind chill temperatures.
